title: Rejuice
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Opened in summer of 2012, this is a fresh juice and smoothies bar that also offers vegan sandwiches (marinated tempeh, portabello mushroom, tomato & veggies) and a quinoa kale salad. Juices are pre-pressed, but you could customize one, and there's coffee as well. Quick and casual, order at the counter. Shares parking lot with Trader Joe's.
